channel.title: tutorial on Cédric Scherer
channel.description: Recent content in tutorial on Cédric Scherer

item.title: The Evolution of a ggplot (Ep. 1)
item.description: 🏁 Aim of this Tutorial [🗃️ T Data Preparation#data) 🌱 The Default Boxplot 🔀 ️Sort Your Data! 💎 Let Your Plot Shine - Get Rid of the Default Settings 📊 The Choice of the Chart Type 💯 More Geoms, More Fun, More Info! 💬 Add Text Boxes to Let The Plot Speaks for Itself 🗺️ Bonus: Add a Tile Map as Legend 🎄 The Final Evolved Visualization 💻 Complete Code for Final Plot 🏁 Aim of this Tutorial In this series of blog posts, I aim to show you how to turn a default ggplot into a plot that visualizes information in an appealing and easily understandable way.
